name: SWEET PROTECTION Strutter Helmet - Unisex
description: An icon in the world of whitewater. This ultralight helmet takes inspiration from the classic baseball cap, delivering a brilliant balance of safety and style. Using a blended nylon-fiberflass shell, this helmet is low bulk with great elastic properties.Long fibre thermoplastic (LFT) shell combines polyamide and fiberglass for great elasticity and rigidity.EVA liner is crack resistant and absorbs shock from impacts without excess bulk.Occigrip dial lets you customize the height and reach of the helmet for a comfortable fit.Comfort pads are soft, anti-allergenic and moisture wicking.
